text: Nuko ubwo ukuri (Intumwa Muhamadi) kuduturutseho kwabageragaho, baravuze bati “Kuki atahawe nk’ibyo Musa yahawe?” (Babwire uti) “Ese mbere (Abayahudi) ntibahakanye ibyo Musa yahawe?” Bakanavuga bati “Mu by’ukuri ni uburozi bwombi (Qur’an na Tawurati) bwunganirana.” Baranavuga bati “Mu by’ukuri byose turabihakanye.”
